LanguageData.TryStartMarriageButtonDesc: Select fiances and start their marriage immediately.
LanguageData.NeedTab_DisableRomanceNeedTip: Disable romance need on this pawn. !!IRREVERSIBLE, USE WITH CAUTION!!
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableNeedAndInteraction_To: If toggle off, all pawns will have no romance need and no interactions will be triggered. You can delete romance need for specific pawn in Needs Tab under Dev mode.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableQuarrels_Tooltip: Lovers might have arguments or quarrels randomly based on compatibility and mood. If toggle off, lovers will never argue or quarrel.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableThoughts_Tooltip: Toggle for Longing, Estranged, Reunion, and Worry thoughts added by this mod.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableSameDayRoutine: Enable same daily routine for lovers
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableSameDayRoutine_Toolti: When toggle on, lovers will try to have the same daily routine (go to bed as his/her lover does). Default On.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_NeedFallPerDay: Romance need fall rate per day (default: 25%): {0}%
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_MaxDistanceForInteractions: Max distance to trigger romantic interactions (default 65): {0}
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_InteractionSelectionWeight: Tweak interactions weights (Randomly pick one of them):
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_InteractionSelectionWeightT: Default is 100%, set it to 0 to disable that kind of interaction, or raise it to increase its chance over others.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_PreceptTabTip: (Backward compat) Right click control for those who owns Ideology but not Biotech. Use Social Tab if you have Biotech. You should see nothing below.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableQuestTooltip: Toggle off if you don't like the "events" added by this mod. They won't be triggered in the game.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_Quest_Adoption_Desc: Adoption is designed to be triggered at kids' birthday with a chance.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_AlwaysAdopts_Tooltip: Adoption will trigger for all eligible children.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_Quest_Other_Desc: Other quests will be triggered by vanilla quest system with chance. Tweak base chances here (game reload needed):
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_GroomsmanAndBridesmaidMustB: Bridesmaid and groomsman must be friend of the fiances
By default, we only allow their friends to be bridesmaid and groomsman. You can turn it off to allow anyone.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_FriendRelationThreshold: For friends, their relationship should be at least (default 30): {0}
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_EnableDebugLogForMarriageCe: Show debug cells for marriage cell finder
Show debug information for marriage cell finder.
LanguageData.RotR_Comms_RequestDone: You negotiated with {0} for the diplomatic marriage.
LanguageData.RotR_Comms_OfferNotAvailable: no nearby settlement available within {0} tiles
LanguageData.RotR_Comms_OfferDone: You negotiated with {0} for the diplomatic marriage.
LanguageData.RotR_Setting_Quest_DiplomaticMarriageAwa: Offering diplomatic marriage and send them to a nearby settlement of that faction. The quest will be disabled if no such settlement.
